shot_metadata.name: THREE_FRAME_FLASH
shot_metadata.title: Three-Frame Flash - Reality Simultaneous
shot_metadata.stitch_from: Shot 16: Complete darkness, Magnús speaking cut off

progressive_state: REALITY BREAK | Complete darkness | Camera frost 10% | Three simultaneous truths | Watching: We see what shouldn't exist

prompt_variants.subject: In the absolute darkness, three frames flash in succession - Frame 1: Family normal at table (2 seconds), Frame 2: Five sheep in their exact positions wearing their clothes (1/24 second), Frame 3: Double exposure of both realities overlapping (1/24 second) - revealing all realities simultaneously true.
prompt_variants.action: FRAME 1 (2 seconds): Emergency match strikes. Magnús lighting candle stub. Family at table normal - five humans in their positions. Sigrid 11 feet away. Everything as we know. FRAME 2 (1/24 second): But in single frame, lit by same candle: Five sheep standing on hind legs in exact positions. Magnús-ram with curved horns. Guðrún-ewe with faldbúningur perfectly placed on sheep head. Jón-lamb fevered, swaying. Lilja-lamb with doll. Sigrid-young ewe, belly slightly full, maintaining 11 feet. All have human teeth in sheep mouths. Wearing the family's clothes. FRAME 3 (1/24 second): Double exposure - both realities overlapping. Human forms transparent over sheep bodies. Sheep forms transparent over human bodies. Both true. Neither true. Candle dies. Darkness returns. Then through window - sweep of light. Industrial beam. Trawler.
prompt_variants.scene: Absolute darkness with three-frame intrusion. No temperature (darkness has no temperature). No breath visible (darkness shows nothing). Just three frames of impossible truth stabbing through void. The candle stub Magnús found was hidden with harðfiskur - saved for emergency.
prompt_variants.style: Three distinct frames exactly as described, camera locked in position (that's where the camera is), documentary capturing reality failure.
prompt_variants.camera_position: Fixed position in darkness receiving three reality flashes, that's where the camera is
prompt_variants.negative_prompt: no subtitles, no smooth transition, three distinct frames, maintain 1/24 second timing

others.cinema_construction: Reveals how film creates reality through editing
others.timing_precision: Exact 1/24 second frames showing cinema's mathematics

notes.thematic_purpose: Ultimate revelation - all interpretations simultaneously valid
notes.revolutionary_technique: Shows reality as choice rather than fixed truth
